title: Logan Coleman Finish Line Memorial Scholarship Fund
description: To provide undergraduate scholarship awards for students enrolled at UCCS who are in their senior year and scheduled to graduate the year they receive this scholarship, in memory of Logan Coleman.
marketingContent:
To provide undergraduate scholarship awards for students enrolled at UCCS who are in their senior year and scheduled to graduate the year they receive this scholarship. 

This scholarship was created in memory of Logan Coleman, a former UCCS student and U.S. Navy veteran.
